title: Interpretation of feces in a dream: seeing feces in a dream

preview.html: Feces in a dream are one of the most disgusting dreams that we see in our dreams and they cause us great anxiety and confusion, because they carry many different meanings and associations that the dreamer would like to know, so we will give you the interpretation. Who among you sees feces in a dream, as interpreted by the great interpreters. Dreams of Arabs such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi: Interpretation of seeing feces in a dream Seeing feces in a dream means that the dreamer will be freed from pain and illness and will live a new life free of problems or diseases. The dream also indicates to debtors that he will be freed from debts and obtain money, and this vision brings many indications. Happy for us, and the happiness that the dreamer will obtain in the near future, is one of the dreams that announce the end of worries and sorrows. Seeing feces in a dream shows many meanings. If the dreamer was a farmer and was about to harvest his crops, then this dream was an indication of the livelihood that the dreamer will have after the harvest and may indicate the formation of new friendships and new relationships. Whoever dreamed of seeing himself comforting himself, this dream was an indication that the dreamer will lose a lot. Of money, so if the dreamer sees himself relaxing in his clothes, this is an indication that he will lose money and lose it because the place allocated to this topic was an indication that the dreamer will spend a lot of money on important things he needs and the money will be in the right place. Who dreams of seeing himself comfortable in a glass lens The dreamer loses some money, and he spends it as a fine or punishment on him, because he wronged someone. Whoever dreams of himself defecating in the sea or river, the dreamer loses some money because of the oppressor, who loses his money. Whoever dreams of seeing himself defecating in his clothes without realizing it, but after... a period. Knowing that he did this act means that he loses money and loses it without his knowledge or his companions. If a person dreams that he defecates and then an animal that he loves comes out of him, then this is a sign that the dreamer will give birth to a new baby, and if the animal is male, then the child will be male, and if it is female, then the child will be Female. Who dreams of seeing feces in a dream, but the dreamer collects the feces and puts it in something that looks like a basket. If the dreamer is a student waiting for the result, his final results will be satisfactory, and if he is a trader, he will make a lot of money. Money through his trade. Whoever dreams of collecting feces to store or give to someone, the dreamer will collect a lot of money, but the money will not be legal, because he will get it by wronging someone, but if the dreamer is poor and weak. And it was. Then the dreamer will spend some money to help a poor person and do so with love and satisfaction. Whoever dreams that he defecates in his clothes with his knowledge, then the dreamer does many abominations, and whoever dreams that he defecates in his pants and sees with his own eyes feces staining his clothes, this is evidence that the dreamer is that. It will create a problem between him and his wife, and the problems may reach the point of divorce. If he dreamed that he was resting in his bed and the dreamer fell ill, then this person’s illness would be prolonged. Whoever dreamed of this was resting and then buried the feces in a hole and covered it with dirt, then he has...

title: Interpretation of a dream about chewing gum by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing gum in a dream means collecting money and other meanings. We will explain this to single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, such as chewing gum, removing gum, dreaming of sticking teeth, or giving gum as a gift to Ibn Sirin, and more in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of chewing gum in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees that he is chewing gum in a dream, this means that the dreamer will get On money, but this money will have disputes or problems. And if he sees in a dream that he is eating incense, this means that the fortuneteller will be involved in something that has been talked about a lot, such as a dispute, a complaint, or the like. Everything that is chewed in a dream, except for food, indicates To a lot of talking as well as chewing. Ibn Sirin says in his famous book (Interpretation of Big Dreams): Chewing gum in a dream means earning money in a dispute or dispute. Chewing gum is also said to indicate sin or immorality. Al-Nabulsi confirmed this meaning in his interpretation of the dream of gum by saying: Whoever sees in his dream that he is chewing gum, he is committing a sin.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' ' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Seeing chewing gum in your dream means that you are angry because of your inability to convey exactly what you want to say to someone, and your mind may be so full of ideas that it is difficult for you to Scrutinize them and find an idea they want to express themselves. On the other hand, it could mean that you are in a difficult situation and are struggling to get out of it, especially if you see gum stuck in your shoe. If you cannot dispose of the chewing gum in the trash, for example, it may pass With a period of hesitation or frustration.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Seeing gum in your mouth symbolizes something that you find difficult to digest or process, and this vision also indicates that you refuse to accept what has been said to you recently. Dreaming about a lot of gum may indicate that your expectations are very high and they are more than you can achieve, so you need to be more realistic in your efforts. The meaning of this dream may be that you are worried about something at the moment and that there is something occupying your mind and thoughts.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? title: Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Watermelon in a dream is interpreted according to the events in the dream in addition to the dreamer’s condition, and translators have given many interpretations of watermelon in a dream, and this seems clear when Ibn Sirin interpreted it in his book “Semantics in the Science of Expressions.” . “Anxiety, as it sometimes expresses the psychological state that the dreamer is going through, as we will see in this article. Watermelon in a dream. The interpreters agreed that the color of watermelon indicates some importance, as red watermelon can indicate that the fortuneteller is going through a period of illness, so it should He takes care of his health, but the watermelon is cut and placed in an attractive way. It can express the organized personality of the fortuneteller. Yellow watermelon in a dream has different meanings, but if the dreamer is trying to reach a certain goal, the vision may indicate that he cannot achieve his goal, so he needs faith and patience. White watermelon in a dream is one of the things that indicates Although the dreamer is protected from diseases and has good health in his body, other scholars interpreted this as an expression of an emotional state that the dreamer may feel with a partner he loves. If the dreamer is a magician, then watermelon indicates that his magic is invalid and not being applied, and this is what many interpreters have mentioned in this vision. Watermelon in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin has different opinions in interpreting watermelon. Sometimes it is a warning of an unfortunate event, and at other times it predicts the appearance of watermelon. Something worthy of praise. A watermelon falling into a house can symbolize the imminent death of a person, while a watermelon falling from a high place like the sky, for example, symbolizes power and money. Regarding the Indian watermelon, Ibn Sirin believes that it generally symbolizes the degree of harmony and compatibility between Individuals, and it was stated that transferring watermelon from one person to another expresses the weight of the carrier’s words and the recipient’s lack of acceptance of this or that speech. The words of the carrier are incorrect in the first place. Watermelon in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi agreed with Ibn Sirin in his interpretation of the Indian watermelon, as well as falling or throwing watermelon in the house, but he added that watermelon in a dream may herald the dreamer’s marriage to the person he desires. He also sees that the outer rind of the watermelon Ibn Shaheen agrees with Al-Nabulsi in interpreting watermelon as a source of livelihood, and seeing watermelon in a dream is like getting rid of prison or imprisonment. It is also believed that eating watermelon in abundance in a dream, Especially the yellow color, is not good, because it is often a sign of sadness, so the fortuneteller must resort to supplication and ask for God's help at all times. In general, watermelon has a group of interpretations that are limited to women or children, in addition to prosperity. Watermelon in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of watermelon for a single woman depends on what she feels while eating it. If she is happy and enjoyable, this indicates good news. In general, Watermelon indicates the girl's upcoming wedding date, but if she sees that she is eating a green watermelon, this often improves

title: Interpretation of buying clothes in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Buying clothes in a dream for a single woman Buying clothes is one of the necessary things in life, especially in a woman’s life, because she is more interested in style and style, and more willing to keep up with it, and the moments of buying clothes are happy moments for people in general and females in particular, and also the vision of buying clothes is one of the favorite and happy visions of people. Insight.But the interpretation of this vision has two conflicting parts, depending on the dreamer’s condition and the type and condition of the clothes he bought in the dream. Therefore, in this article, we will list the interpretation of the vision of buying clothes in a dream for a single woman. Buying clothes in a dream for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the vision of buying clothes in a dream for a single woman. Many commentators unanimously agree that buying new clothes means a new life, and it is a vision that indicates goodness in general. , as long as these clothes are in good and clean condition.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');If an unmarried girl sees herself buying new and beautiful clothes, this may indicate that she will enter into a new relationship, which may be love, engagement, or marriage. It is possible that a new job will raise her status or an interesting trip that will change her psychological state, and it may mean that she needs renewal in life in general or a change in some of her personal characteristics. Seeing a single woman buying clothes in a dream could also mean that she needs to organize her thoughts if she sees... She herself arranges these clothes in a dream after buying them.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');But if she sees that she is buying these clothes and giving them to someone she knows, then this is evidence of her love for him and her thinking of him, and vice versa. Buying clothes in a dream for a single woman with a son Sirin Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing new clothes in an unmarried woman’s dream is only good news, and abundant livelihood and great happiness await her. He also said that seeing an unmarried girl buying a new dress is evidence and an indication of concealment and purity, and perhaps this dress indicates a wedding dress and you will find the right person. for her and marry him soon.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? title: Interpretation of beads in a dream: Seeing beads in a dream

preview.html: Beads in a dream are dreams that carry a lot of ambiguity to know their interpretation. They carry many different meanings and connotations for us, and beads are among the beautiful things that are used in clothing and various other things, to obtain distinction. Shapes and embroidery in different shapes on our clothes or outside our clothes, and the Khazars exist in millions of different shapes, and we will show you the interpretation of seeing beads in a dream by the translator Ibn Sirin as he explained it to us.Interpretation of beads in a dreamSeeing beads in a dream indicates the presence of a good friend in life, just as seeing a bead indicates One in a dream indicates the presence of a friend close to you. But seeing many beads in a dream is evidence of the presence of illegal money and obtaining money in different ways.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Receiving beads in a dream also indicates money, servants, and a new job. While Ibn Shaheen explained that seeing beads in a dream is evidence of money and the dreamer’s favor. Obtaining Beads in a dream are evidence of money and abundant livelihood that the dreamer will acquire or travel abroad.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' ': {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Seeing gold beads in a dream is evidence of happiness and money that the dreamer will obtain in the near future. Seeing black beads in a dream means meeting a person far from God, cruel Heart and spoiled. Seeing colored beads in a dream is evidence of the presence of a two-faced person who is not truthful in his words, and colored beads indicate problems and troubles that the dreamer will face in the near future. As beads in a dream indicate, evidence of the presence of a woman in the dreamer’s life, and obtaining beads in The dream is evidence of obtaining a living and money as well as the beads that you will obtain in the near future.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, ' params': {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Beads in a dream are evidence of the dreamer’s livelihood and money during the period of travel. Seeing a single bead in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s close friend. The presence of beads in the house is evidence of The next good for the owner

title: Interpretation of a dream about black pants by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing black pants in a dream means problems due to haste, and other interpretations we will explain to the single, married, pregnant, and divorced man, such as wearing black jeans or buying new torn black pants that are wide, narrow, and long, or in short, according to Ibn Sirin and others in continuation of the topic below: Interpretation of black pants in a dream Seeing black pants in a dream explains this. The vision represents the problems that the dreamer will face because of the wonderful work that he will do, and he will not achieve the success that he wants at work, and he will go through great disappointment and will have to live a period in which people expect him. Bad eyes, seeing black pants in a dream sometimes indicates a decision. The fast that the fortuneteller will take to marry someone who is not suitable for you and you will feel remorse for that. Seeing black pants in a dream means that the dreamer feels very angry towards the opposite sex because of the wrong relationships he experienced, as he believes that everyone is trying to deceive and harm him. Black pants also indicate a request to enter into Work, marriage and having children.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? Seeing black pants in a dream means that the visionary may not get married because of the bad love stories she experienced in the past. Whoever sees black pants means that the visionary will experience suffering alone after losing his family and interruption of life. But In other cases, seeing black pants in a dream indicates kindness and that you will be the holder of the position and also indicates money that will come into your hands soon. Interpretation of wearing black pants in a dream indicates sight. Wearing black pants in a dream At this age you will live in sadness and black pants show financial problems that You will fall on them, and this vision is a sign of increasing debt for the other person and of news that will cause you sadness and pain. title: Interpretation of a black snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A black snake in a dream has many interpretations, including good news for the dreamer, some of which portends the emergence of some problems for him, and it is a warning to the priest to be careful about his current conditions and relationships and those around him. He must also turn to God and get close to Him to avoid problems, and we will tell you the most important interpretations about seeing a black snake in a dream. A black snake in a dream. The snake represents a source of general disturbance and fear when seen realistically, and indicates suffering, pain, and anxiety when seen in a dream. It is an indication of problems and conflicts for the dreamer. A merchant seeing a black snake in a dream could mean the envy surrounding him, the financial problems he is exposed to in his business, and that he must be very careful in his financial decisions. Small snakes in a dream are weak enemies and the dreamer can trust them, but the small size of the snakes is evidence that he They can be easily eliminated when discovered. Murder means eliminating all differences and conflicts in the family. Murder in the workplace in a dream is a sign of the end of work problems. If a black snake attacks you in a dream, this may be a sign of some problems that you will suffer, but you will be able to get rid of them. From it and return to your normal life. Black snake in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Dreaming of a black snake means that the dreamer suffers from the hatred and envy of one of his relatives, and that strife will inevitably occur between them. It can also mean that the dreamer has a woman with bad traits and characteristics. Therefore, he must pay attention to it. As Ibn Sirin explained, a dream about a black snake is a warning to the dreamer to beware of enemies who hate him. The dreamer’s vision of a snake in his bed is evidence that he is suffering from worries and concerns. As for the presence of the snake in the water in the dream or killing it, it symbolizes escaping from Enemies and freedom from problems. What is the interpretation of a black snake in a single woman’s dream? A girl who sees a black snake biting her in a dream is not a good sign, because it either indicates a person forcing her into a forbidden relationship or a conspiracy being conspired against her. An unmarried girl being exposed to destructive envy is Interpretation of her dream of a black snake at the door of her room at home, but when she kills it, especially in the kitchen, this is a sign that her affairs are improving. It is a sign that the girl is preoccupied with depressing thoughts that affect her and prevent her from moving forward in her life, and that there are dangers that she faces regarding family and relationships in her life. It may mean Her dream of a black snake means that she needs to be careful in her marriage decision and be careful in her romantic relationships and the people she trusts emotionally. A snake biting an unmarried girl in a dream on her left hand may mean that she has committed many sins and disobedience, but if the snake bites her on her leg, this indicates There are many stalkers in her life, but you will overcome them quickly. Seeing a black snake in a dream and killing it for a single woman. Seeing a girl getting rid of a black snake in a dream by killing is evidence that there is a person in her life who is trying to harm her, and her success in killing him is good news of victory over enemies. If the black snake bites Women are not
